subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The veteran forward Adam Mair re-signed for three years with the Buffalo Sabres yesterday. Mair earned a slight raise above the $675,000 he made last season. The deal was reached a day before Mair was eligible to become an unrestricted free agent. Mair had two goals and nine assists in 82 games last season and added a career-high five points in 16 playoff games.
